list_definition.definition: to move slowly, quietly or secretly
to move on hands or knees or with the body close to the ground

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The cat crept towards the bird.

list_definition.definition: (of plants) to grow along the ground, up a wall etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Flowering bougainvillea crept over the white walls of the villa.
